details.name: ISO 19005-3:2012 - 6.8 Embedded files - Subtype
details.description: The MIME type of an embedded file, or a subset of a file, shall be specified using the Subtype key of the file specification dictionary. If the MIME type is not known, the "application/octet-stream" shall be used.
